org.apache.giraph.counters

类 GiraphHadoopCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.counters.GiraphHadoopCounter

  • public class GiraphHadoopCounter
extends Object
    Wrapper around Hadoop Counter to make it easier to use.

    • 构造器概要

      Create wrapping a Hadoop Counter.
